title: If You’re Not Alone
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>I tried following Aqours’ footsteps and started self-training on the beach<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I see. The winter sea breeze is cold, isn’t it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yes, it was cold and intense, running became really hard.... Ophelia was with me, but I felt like giving up. That’s why I really admire you and the others for always training like that, Riko-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu. Even we do it while complaining that it’s hard<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Really!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Totally~! Fufu. But, when we do it while crying out that it’s painful or cold like that, it became fun before we knew it. Didn’t that happen to you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>You’re right.... It might have been like that<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>That’s why, if you invite the rest of Nijigaku and do it together, it might also become fun, you know, Shizuku-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I understand! I think I’ll try inviting Kasumi-san and the others!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>That’s the spirit!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
